Name: Mineirinho Director's Cut
About the game: A really cool 3d platform game, lots of extreme adventures with our friend Miner, now we have the option Double Miner and the adventure gets a lot cooler. Director's Cut version has unpublished scenes that have never been seen. Double Miner Super Fun Unpublished scenes. Fun 3D Levels Radical Movements. Cool Food power ups. Kids love this game.
